clause: Each country shall submit nationally determined contributions to reduce emissions.
Member states commit to carbon neutrality by 2050.
Annex I countries shall reduce greenhouse gas emissions by an average of 5% below 1990 levels.
Member states shall eliminate tariffs on 90% of goods over a five-year period.
Parties shall ensure fair labor practices and prohibit forced labor in supply chains.
Platforms must remove illegal content promptly and provide transparency reports.
Member states shall cooperate in disaster risk reduction and emergency response.

treaty: Convention on the Rights of the Child
clause: States shall ensure that children are protected from economic exploitation.
Parties shall guarantee access to environmental information and public participation.
States shall facilitate safe, orderly, and regular migration through international cooperation.
